tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE quests (quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, quest_name VARCHAR(255), quest_description TEXT, completion_status BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE missions (mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_name VARCHAR(255), mission_description TEXT, completion_status BOOLEAN)

CREATE TABLE missions (
   mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   mission_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   quest_id INT,
   completion_status BOOLEAN,
   FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE objectives (
   objective_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   objective_description TEXT NOT NULL,
   mission_id INT,
   completion_status BOOLEAN,
   FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES missions(mission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    mission_description TEXT,
    quest_id INT,
    completion_status ENUM('not started', 'in progress', 'completed'),
    FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE objectives (
    objective_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    objective_description TEXT,
    mission_id INT,
    completion_status ENUM('not started', 'in progress', 'completed'),
    FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES missions(mission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    player_id INT,
    quest_id INT,
    mission_id INT,
    objective_id INT,
    progress_status ENUM('not started', 'in progress', 'completed'),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES missions(mission_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (objective_id) REFERENCES objectives(objective_id)
);
